website_summaries.verdict: The price for nearly 1 oz. of product is unbeatable. Will soften lips, too.
pros: For those turned off by the chemicals in many cold sore treatments, Basic Organics is all natural
It contains vitamins A, D, and K, along with cocoa butter, so it's an excellent moisturizer
Many users say cold sores shrink visibly after a few applications
cons: Effects may not be as instant as other OTC cold sore treatments

customer_reviews.title: Yess!
customer_reviews.text: Very moisturing for the lips and.... In my experience it has healed genital h***** much faster than other natural remedies. I like cleaning it with hydrogen peroxide, and putting a little bit of this on it and poof it’s gone within 3 - 4 days. When I was use to 5-10 days. TMI but I hope to help someone and this product is great for basic lip moisturizer to the ugliest of insecurities..
customer_reviews.author: tlmxoo

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give it more stars I would. I’m a ER nurse that can’t take acyclovir due to allergic reactions...this helped so much. Once a year due to over sun/snow exposure I get raging lip herpes. This sped up the healing process! Normally I crush L-Lysine and apply it to site. This saved me so much time. Note: I take the pills as well. And please don’t wear this in the sun it doesn’t have a SPF
customer_reviews.author: Datblondenurse

customer_reviews.title: I like to take it orally in tablet form and use ...
customer_reviews.text: Lysine works extremely well on cold sores. I like to take it orally in tablet form and use this topical one as well because for some reason in my mind that is more effective than using one or the other (not sure of the scientific research on that). This jar is pretty big considering you only use a little bit for the surface area of your lips. I've had my jar for years and its still going, I should probably check the expiration haha. This stuff is awesome and soothing on the lips and helps get rid of the cold sores way faster. I recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: good ointment, didnt shorten life
customer_reviews.text: I have struggled with the dreaded cold sore when i get sick every year. Since it happens often i wanted to try this to see if it does help. It would great as a general lip ointment but it doesn't seem to stay on long enough. My recommendation: get yourself some Calcium Bentonite Clay Powder and layer the sore. let it dry completely. then gently soak with water after several hours to loosen and clean up to apply a new batch. took me 24 hours for it completely dry. NO more days off work :-)
customer_reviews.author: Patryk

customer_reviews.title: More like fever blister growth potion..
customer_reviews.text: The very first time I used this, and didn't even have a blister, just slight tingles.... within an hour of putting this on I had the worst blister I've ever encountered. I've also never had one develop so fast, that usually takes a few days. It's like I was pouring gasoline on a fire with how it amped up my fever blister progression. I would NOT recommend this product to anyone. Total waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Really works!!
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic for chapped lips and cold sores! It provided big results in 24 hours, better than anything I’ve tried. I have dry lips from weekly air travel (and wearing lipstick) and develop cold sores once in a while from stress. I’ve tried all types of ointments and spent a lot of money on pricey lip balms- nothing works better than this. I am applying it 3 times per day, especially right before bed, and my lips look and feel so much healthier after only 2 days! Thank you Basic Organics for a great product and a great price!!
customer_reviews.author: Kami I

customer_reviews.title: I love this balm! Works amazingly well!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a lip balm that would help with chapped, dry, peeling lips. I apply this at night and I love the way it feels. I don’t usually get cold sores, but I have a pimple on my lip line (which hurts like the dickens!) and this balm seems to help. After applying, I feel a little tingling and hopefully that means it’s working. I’ve only used it two nights in a row so I’m still waiting on results, but I love the way it feels!
customer_reviews.author: Sommer Hallock

customer_reviews.title: So Far, So Good
customer_reviews.text: I received this lip balm right after a cold sore had just gone away. My lips get chapped when I’m about to get a cold sore and it can be caused for whatever reason. The reasons range from stress, lack of sleep, weather, etc. Right after I felt like my lips were getting chapped I knew the cold sore was trying to come back up. I put on some of this ointment a couple of times daily until my chapped lips were gone. I’m so impressed and I know it did it’s job. You can’t beat the price for the affect of the product. Other more expensive products such as Aveda have NEVER worked on me.
customer_reviews.author: Loli

customer_reviews.title: It really helped!
customer_reviews.text: I had a weird sore that was persisting and hurting on my lip during pregnancy (pregnancy makes weird stuff happen to your body) I had never had issues with lip or cold sores previously. I got this after buying some other chap sticks and various beeswax stuff. It cleared up the sore immediately after two or three night time applications. I randomly use it now just to help keep those buggers away.
customer_reviews.author: Lala

customer_reviews.title: Forget Abreva - this stuff kicks its to the curb!!
customer_reviews.text: Soooooo much better than that overpriced Abreva. Start putting this on at the first sign of a cold sore and it’ll sometimes just not even appear. If it does it’s usually gone in two, maybe three days. I won’t be without this miracle ointment.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy-the-Crow

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm !
customer_reviews.text: I just wanted to say thank you for making this product, I’ve been getting cold sores on my lips for some time now (years) they get red, ugly and bumpy. As soon as I feel the itching sensation and see the redness in my lips, I immediately put some of this lip balm and it really stops it from getting worse. I apply it three times a day, a small amount goes along way. It would get very embarrassing to have a cold sore and it did not look good at all. So this product really helps to prevent it from getting ugly ! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Actually works
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit of a skeptic but figured this was cheap enough to try even if all these reviews were bogus. But, this is actually worthy of all the praise and 5 star reviews. I had one cold sore come on so I furiously applied this stuff every hour at least....it was gone the next day. The next day after that, another one tried to pop up and again, I went to town using this stuff and same thing. Gone the next day. Abreva has NEVER been this quick or effective. And the amount of product you get is crazy, it will take years before I run out.

customer_reviews.title: Stays on Top of The Skin
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to treat the symptoms of plaque psoriasis, dry itchy flakey skin. It is almost odorless and is much like using Vaseline. It is thick, and stays on top of the skin until removed with a cloth. I like this, as it really holds the moisture in my skin, and can quickly reduce the dry flakey symptoms. The products that absorb into the skin just don't do as well in this regards. And it reduces the itchy feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Dave R.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money, better products out there!!
customer_reviews.text: Would give this no stars if I could. Applies nice but feels like I used Vaseline and only Vaseline on my lips. There are much better products out there that are ACTUALLY organic and worth the money. This does not help with cold sores, you’re better off buying Lysine pills and actual lip ointment such as the Quantum line. Don’t be fooled, don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Bananamana

customer_reviews.title: Cold sore killer!
customer_reviews.text: I never had heard of L-lysine before purchasing this stuff. It does miracles for cold sores! I’ve used it for two days and I would say my cold sore is now 75% gone. I used to use Abreva which didn’t really work and cold sores took like 2.5 weeks to go away. In two days this thing is on its way to being gone, amazing!
customer_reviews.author: amber

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: My mother in law has been battling cold sores for several years now, although she never had them in the past and we are not sure what triggered the flare ups she used all possible remedies to get rid of them with no luck. This ointment has been a miracle in combination with L-Lysine supplement that she has been taking. Her cold sores were gone within 5-6 days and have not came back for solid 5 months now and going strong. I am very happy I came across this ointment on Amazon as this is truly a great remedy for cold sore treatment.
customer_reviews.author: Stasy

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is legit the best most effective ointment/balm I have ever used to treat an active cold sore. It seems almost unreal how quickly my coldsore seemed to heal and disappear overnight. Over the years (plagued by cold sores for over 20 years) I’ve used everything from Abreva, Lip Clear, Bactine, Zovirax, peroxide, rubbing alcohol, Herpicin-L, Campho, you name it— this is the real deal. I love that it applies like Vaseline or Aquaphor. No tacky, sticky or goopy mess. No white chalky cast. It’s clear, softening and soothing. Wish I could give it ten stars.
customer_reviews.author: ollie

customer_reviews.title: It might be a miracle
customer_reviews.text: I love this lysine lip balm. I waited almost a year to review it because I don't want to jinx it *knock on wood*, but I get cold sores when I'm really stressed out. Ever since I started using this every night I haven't gotten one. I know I've been really stressed a few times in the last year and of course I can't be 100% sure it's because of this that I'm not getting them, but it's the only thing I've changed so I'm a believer and I will buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: EXPIRED PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item a couple weeks ago and just noticed an expiration date on the bottom for 6/18 (last month)
customer_reviews.author: Niki

customer_reviews.title: Lip ointment L-Lysine good for chap dry lips, cold sores; lots of product
customer_reviews.text: This works wonderful and smells great for a natural product for irritated, dry, cracked lips, I also know L-Lysine is great for cold sores and prevents them from multiplying as fast and heals faster. So got this in preparation of the cold weather winter months, and used it for chapped lips and it's just a nice all around and there is a lot in the tub for what it's worth. Thank you for making a wonderful product Basic Organics.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Howden

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t prevent cold sores. Try Valtrex instead.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice chapstick but I can tell you for sure it doesn’t prevent or heal a single cold sore. I’ve been using for over a year and have see absolutely no change in frequency, duration, or pain. Do yourself a favor and go to your doctor and get a prescription for Valtrex. It’s a miracle worker. I wish someone had told me about it years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie MTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: It’s Been Helpful
customer_reviews.text: I have cold sore outbreaks about once or twice a year. I’ve gone as long as a couple of years without one at all. Although this has not done anything as far as helping my lips heal, it has helped keep them moisturized far, far longer than a lip balm and keeps them from cracking. It’s lighter than vaseline and I appreciate that part of it. Edit- I used this along with DocoShield and within 72 hours I had my nice soft, cold sore free lips back. I will be using them both daily for preventive care.
customer_reviews.author: JLFS

customer_reviews.title: Highly Upset
customer_reviews.text: I just received today. I haven't tried it, because the jar is all greasy and I'm terrified to try and use it. The thing is it had plastic over it and it still seams to have been tampered with some way some how. It's not a full jar of ointment, I'm extremely disappointed in how this arrived. The package itself was fine the product was tampered with. You guys really should start watching over who ever prep and packaged it. I'm upset and my money was wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Uniquely Awkward

customer_reviews.title: definitely fake
customer_reviews.text: i’ve ordered this before and the product was great! this time i received it and it clearly was not the same thing. the label was different, the actual ointment itself smelled like tar and chemicals (the first one i got smelled fruity). i tested it out anyways and put a little bit on my lips but i had to take it off after about a minute because my lips started to burn. i don’t know what’s going on over in production but i know a counterfeit health product when i see one. don’t buy unless they get their act together.
customer_reviews.author: liv n.

customer_reviews.title: They are horrible and so embarrassing
customer_reviews.text: I've suffered from cold sores since I can remember. They are horrible and so embarrassing! I've tried every "quick healer" on the market. I've had this for several months and I've had more outbreaks since using it. Granted, I wear my stress and I've been feeling stressed. I will continue to use this product in conjunction with my l-lysine pills, echinacea, and abreva.
customer_reviews.author: N. DeCourcy

customer_reviews.title: Yummy scent/flavor, many different uses!
customer_reviews.text: Miracle stuff! Works as advertised. Heals skin, soothes chapped lips, and prevents and quickly treats cold sores (especially when coupled with lysine supplementation). Nice large container, too; I actually scraped some into smaller containers so I could stash it in multiple places!
customer_reviews.author: Jalynne

customer_reviews.title: Lifetime Customer.
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome ointment! I am so happy with this. Last time I had a cold sore coming on I used Abbreva which did not work at all, and I felt burning and irritation. This worked like a gem. I put it on at the first feel of a cold sore coming on, and I barely got one (very small), and healed in record time. I will be a lifetime customer.
customer_reviews.author: Fitness lady

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Second time purchasing. I buy this for eczema that persists around the mouth *no blisters* I know what ppl usually use this for and I reccomand it for that as well. It works great. They have increased the price since I bought it but I'm still going to buy unless its ridiculously expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Nicki Lee

customer_reviews.title: Very pleasant and it works for me
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how nice the texture of this is. I don't like the waxy feel of chapstick, and although this is like vaseline, it somehow feels smoother. It has a pleasant taste and best of all, no coldsore since I purchased it. I use a pricey prescription, and I was pleasantly surprised that I have not had to use that since starting to use this.
customer_reviews.author: K. D. Foster

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for over a month and I love it. I have replaced it from my usual lip balm I used to use. This goes on very light, not cakey like some other lip balms. It lasts a very long time. And It cured my cold sore quickly. I have not had a Cold sore since. And my lips can get chapped in the winter months but nit when I use this daily. Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Meeshee

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a lip moisturizer and whenever I feel a cold sore coming along and that’s all to be honest I only feel them coming along but they never really do, not while I’m using this product they don’t, I can’t be any happier has worked wonders for me. I used to get cold sores that would last over a week about four times a year and it’s been six months since my last one ever since I started using this
customer_reviews.author: Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Great for Chapped Lips
customer_reviews.text: I punished my lips April 2017 by snowboarding 2 days without sunscreen, since then my lips flake & chap. I was using A&D Ointment for a long time but this is even better at keeping my lips moist, though I don't know if the Lysine itself has any effect, it's probably the combination of petrolatum, lanolin & cocoa butter. This hasn't "cured" my chapped lips but I like the way it moisturizes, and my lips are doing better.
customer_reviews.author: Jake!

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm! Gold in a bottle
customer_reviews.text: what would i do without this product, best thing i have found ever. I use to get cold soars here and there and used Abreva and that worked great but this stuff is like gold in a bottle. I cant tell you the last time i had a cold sore and the minute i feel anything i put this on and never appears! I recommend this to everyone who deals with cold sores.
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: Excellent prevention of out breaks
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this every night for almost a year and have only had 3 out breaks. Usually I have 8-12 per year. Very happy with this product and will purchase again. I consider it more a nightly prevention versus treatment for a sore. I'll use abreva for an out break and go back to this a few days after. Put the abreva on really thick and leave it like a white dot over the sore, 3 days of that and then back to this amazing lip balm to keep sores away.
customer_reviews.author: Leanne Byram

customer_reviews.title: Cold sore killer!
customer_reviews.text: I get cold sores on the same spot maybe 3-5 per year. Usually around this time of year. I saw a small red dot below my lip around midday. That night I saw a few others so I liberally applied this and took some lysine pills and next morning...gone. This stuff works better for me than abreva. Will buy the rest of my life.
customer_reviews.author: Lance

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for chapped dry lips!
customer_reviews.text: I have dry chapped lips and am also a bottom lip biter!! I have tried everything on the market for much more money - this is the absolute best! People really need to know about this product and I accidently found out about it! It keeps my lip moist and perfect! I try to keep extra bottles in my purse!
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Kirbach

customer_reviews.title: I really love this product
customer_reviews.text: I really love this product. I take lysine when I get a cold sore. I also use this as well. Wonderful. I also get the same herpes virus (cold sore virus) in my mouth. "I know YUCK". Some times I also get a real bad flare up and I get them in my nose (ultra YUCK right), but along with the oral lysine l use this. Wonderful is all I can say.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Effective and affordable
customer_reviews.text: Since I’ve gotten this product a month ago I have had 2 instances where I’ve felt a cold sore coming on. Both times when I’ve applied this and taken a lysine supplement it has stopped it in its tracks. They never fully developed into cold sores and my lips would be back to normal in 1-3 days. Definitely recommend for the effectiveness and the price! It’s also very moisturizing but I would be wary about using it as your everyday lip balm because it could lose its effectiveness over time.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Love the scent and texture
customer_reviews.text: Don't know if topical lysine actually prevents cold sores (I do know the tablets I ingest are extremely helpful.....EDIT; I THINK THIS IS ACTUALLY HELPING PREVENT THEM..... I was surprised how much I like to use this. The texture is like Vaseline, except not near as heavy or greasy. It's unexpectedly light in texture, no greasy or waxy film in my mouth if it gets inside. Very nice smell. Like a very very faint lemon smell (I guess like a lemon cookie.
customer_reviews.author: Fargo

customer_reviews.title: ... for the first time when I got a really bad cold sore
customer_reviews.text: I was taking Lysine supplements for the first time when I got a really bad cold sore. I expected it to last at least 3 weeks, so I ordered this thinking what the hell. Even if it was the Lysine supplements that did all the heavy lifting, my cold sore was gone in 5 days. I can't say for sure how much of a role the ointment played, but I can say that it did a very good job of keeping my lips moist during that awful phase when dead skin is sloughing off of your lip. Gross, I know.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I have trouble with nerves so I thought my lips often I have tried everything this is the best product by far I already took it by pill form if you have dry lips you will love this product
customer_reviews.author: Terri Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Skin can’t absorb Lysine!!! Garbage!!
customer_reviews.text: Skin cannot be a pathway for amino acids like Lysine. They must be cosumed. Don’t waste your money. Just buy the pills.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: Very hydrating. Nice smell and texture !
customer_reviews.text: I really like this ointment. Frankly I don’t know how well it works to treat cold sores because I was on medication for the cold sore at the same time I was using it, but I put it on every night before bed and take l- lysine supplements everyday and haven’t had one since *knocks on wood*. Even if I didn’t ever have a cold sore I would use this stuff. It’s great as chapstick, has a really nice texture and smell. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: B&B

customer_reviews.title: Miracle for Cold Sores
customer_reviews.text: I have struggled with nasty huge cold sores since I can remember. I get them at least every other month and even when I don’t have them, I have a constant tingly feeling that’s extremely uncomfortable. Those who get cold sores often know what I mean. I bought this product when I had a full blown cold sore and it cleared up within DAYS. I put it on every single night and I haven’t had a cold sore in 5 months which is amazing to me. Highly recommend this product to anyone with these embarrassing and hurtful sores. thos isn’t my life saver I have one at home, work, and my car. Will never leave home without it.
customer_reviews.author: Madison Conrad

customer_reviews.title: Best ointment
customer_reviews.text: Best product for dry cracked lips. I also randomly decided one night to put it on a pimple I had tried to pop and just irritated. I woke up to the irritation being gone, and the pimple half the size. I out it on all of my acne now. Just small spot treatments. Somehow it works better than my prescription acne ointment. I love this stuff and will buy again when necessary.
customer_reviews.author: adam weaver

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for around $7 from Amazon. I read good reviews about this product so I give a try as I tried many lip balms but none of them work really well for my super dried lip. I was amazed how moisturized this lip balm is keeping my lip from drying. I use it 3-4 times a day and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: high quality requirer

customer_reviews.title: GOOD STUFF!
customer_reviews.text: Warning **** gross, I’m sorry. But I got a HUGE cold sore on my lip and it was in a spot it’s never been in. When they are in new places they tend to be a lot worse than ones before. I got some of this online and in less than three days it has helped so much! I used a combination of this and camphor phenique. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Well,
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing for cold sores that I've ever tried. It just works. I use it daily, and if I happen to feel that itch, I double it up. I haven't had one last for more than two or three days. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: wearemr

customer_reviews.title: It works good but is oily
customer_reviews.text: This lip ointment is okay. I got it because I tend to get cold sores quite often and thought this would prevent that. Now I haven't gotten any cold sores in weeks... the balm is very oily feeling on the lips and doesn't last as long as I would like. The container however was much larger than expected and has a lot of product in it which I was pleasantly surprised about!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Moore

customer_reviews.title: I was glad to find this ointment form of Lysine in this ...
customer_reviews.text: I was glad to find this ointment form of Lysine in this jar. It works. At the first sign of a cold sore I put it on and there is no cold sore. If I wait to long and use it it take the irritation away and the cold sore goes away much faster than without.
customer_reviews.author: Lauri

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: This ointment is great for scrapes, cold sores, chapped skin!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Brown

customer_reviews.title: This made it worse
customer_reviews.text: This actually made it worse :( After a month it’s still red on that only area on my lip. I shouldn’t have applied this product and just allowed it to heal and dry up as usual because it never left a scar before.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: it's great
customer_reviews.text: this mud mask is great....dries off quickly and quite easy to remove....refresh's and softness my skin every time I use it...it also has immediate results it completely make my face and skin glowing and looking young full I will by buying it again
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Peeva

customer_reviews.title: Great for cold sores, dry, cracked lips!
customer_reviews.text: I use this product constantly when traveling. My lips are extremely sensitive to dry weather and when I travel I tend to get dry cracked lips. This is the best ointment I have ever used. Its perfect for preventing cold sores too. Stops the inflammation immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. My lips used to always be dry and flakey until I started using this product. My lips are soft and supple now. I bought it because I went to Mexico on vacation and got my lips sunburned. I ended up with a huge blister that was not healing. Within a few days of using this ointment my lips returned to normal. It’s a small container but seems to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: LInda

customer_reviews.title: Not working for me
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking the oral L-Lysine and using the ointment daily. However, I still got a huge blistery cold sore just yesterday! I also take Valtrex when I see one coming on. I'm so discouraged this isn't helping and I wonder what else I can do.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Cold sores be gone!
customer_reviews.text: I use this as my chapstick and have 4 jars in every conceivable location. If I feel a cold sore coming on, I put a lot on and sometimes it doesn't become a cold sore. If it does, then this stuff helps it go away much faster than anything else (i.e. abreva - I have tried everything...!!!).
customer_reviews.author: Jean B.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but certainly doesn't prevent cold sores
customer_reviews.text: This product is something I use every night. It helps prevent lips chapping at night. However, it definitely doesn't help prevent cold sores and doesn't really help them heal either.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Good ointment
customer_reviews.text: So far I really like this ointment. It's a tiny bit sticky feeling and stays on my lips longer that other lip ointments I've used probably due to that. I don't know how well it works to prevent or heal a cold sore as I haven't had one in the couple weeks I've used it.
customer_reviews.author: SophieW

customer_reviews.title: Very effective
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 varities of l-lysine lip products for cold sores. This one is WAY better than the other brand I purchased. This is highly effective in bringing them under control. I do also take the NOW brand L-lysine 1000 mg pills, which were also good quality, for a two prong treatment approach.
customer_reviews.author: Amdarela

customer_reviews.title: Lip healing gold
customer_reviews.text: Whenever I'm about to get a cold sore my lip gets really dry and peely. That is a sign and I used this product immediately when I felt that and this cold sore never came. So far the only topical product that I have used that works.
customer_reviews.author: ladiep

customer_reviews.title: Decent- not a huge winner though in comparison to petroleum jelly.
customer_reviews.text: I think if put on at night it works to soften the lips. Overall it's not going to repair any crazy damage to the skin on lips, but will sooth dry or chapped lips. It feels like petroleum jelly, and overall I'm not sure how potent the lysine really is. Not sure I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Reckon Ralph

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Clear Up Cold Sore on Nose
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to treat an active cold sore on my nose. After using the product for over a week, I saw no change in my cold sore. In fact, the sore was getting worse. I ended up having to go to the store to purchase a different medication, and am already seeing a difference. I didn’t give zero stars because I have also been intermittently using this product as a nighttime lip moisturizer, and I wake up in the morning with my lips still feeling moisturized. Also the container looks small, but a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Jinaan

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I really struggle when my lips are exposed to the sun. I get sun blisters badly. Its rare that I get them but when I do it's awful. This stuff was AMAZING
customer_reviews.author: JAnne

customer_reviews.title: Best for cold sores
customer_reviews.text: This Ointment is great !! I got a little tingle /dryness Friday by Saturday morning I felt the bump . So I started applying all day Saturday & now today is Sunday and there’s barely anything visible . I can kind of say this prevetend the sore from getting bigger , I’m extremely pleased & will recommend .
customer_reviews.author: NATAZHA Baez

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: At the first sign of tingle, I immediately apply this to my lips. It seems to work well. I haven't gotten a serious blister in a while.
customer_reviews.author: Mon K

customer_reviews.title: Healing!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It heals up my shingles quite well. It speeds up the healing time by several days! Plan to buy more of it but this one will probably last a good long while.
customer_reviews.author: S.D.Y.

customer_reviews.title: Very valuable resource for GHSV1
customer_reviews.text: I used this along side antivirals at the very start of a ghsv1 outbreak and it quenched the outbreak before it even broke skin, and my symptoms only lasted about 3-4 days. What a game changer!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Basic Organics L-Lysine Lip Ointment
customer_reviews.text: I was a skeptic when I saw this product. Now I am a believer. It works great and helps when I need the gloss to work without drawing attention.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is now my staple item for lip care products. I suffer from terrible reoccurring cold sores and this is very healing and non irritating. Has a nice light citrus scent. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: buy this!!!!
customer_reviews.text: i use this stuff as a preventative and it works great. went down from 4 outbreaks down to just one a year. i use 4 of these 8 oz's a year. doesn't take much. seller is fast and courteous. repeat customer. the stuff they have over the counter at your local drugstore does even compare to this. trust me i tried it all.
customer_reviews.author: ira cruz

customer_reviews.title: ♡ Buyer's Rejoice! ♡
customer_reviews.text: The worst thing about having dry, cracked lips is how chapsticks tend to provide temporary relief without real healing. This stuff is different. It works SO well for me, I'm thrilled that I've finally found something that feels as delicious as it tastes! Yet, you won't feel the need to continually reapply it indefinitely. Basically... WORTH IT!
customer_reviews.author: ashesrisen

customer_reviews.title: Great preventative!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. I’m notorious for easily getting a cold sore during the colder seasons or with stress. I’ve used this for chapped lips as needed and at night time before bed and so far no cold sore! It’s a miracle. Haven’t had the chance to test how it treats cold sores yet because I haven’t even gotten one yet! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Carlee

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a miracle for me!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you have recurrent cold sores, you MUST try this! After using expensive cold sore treatments and still seeing signs of them for almost a year, I came across this and thought for $4, it was worth a try. Since I started using it, I haven't had NOT ONE cold sore! NONE! I use it as a preventive treatment and apply it every night as part of my nightly routine, just a thin smear on and around the lips. I've used it for several months now and can't hardly tell any has been used. This jar should last well over a year or more. I can't stress how pleased I am with this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: momof2

customer_reviews.title: Easy appilcation and little goes a long way
customer_reviews.text: I have a scorching case of Herps and with daily use of this product, I have kept my outbreaks down to ~ every 4-5 months and are much less severe than before...SO, I have to attribute the decrease in my symptoms to this ointment... :>
customer_reviews.author: Ted Striker

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from cold sores when I get stressed and when the weather changes. Normally I take L-Lysin pills but recently I have a hard time swallowing pills so I thought this was a better alternative! I love the feeling it gives my lips and it really healed my sore quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Great Moisturizer for dry fever blister spots on face as well as chapped lips
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for a few weeks now and I am impressed. I had a lot of dry spots around my mouth from fever blister outbreaks and regular moisturizer was not doing it for me. Since I have used this on them they have seemed to heal up. They are still a little dry but not nearly as bad as they were before. I put it on at night after I wash my face in the shower. It lasts through the night and the following day. I also use it as a moisturizer for my chapped lips. I have not had an outbreak since.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Works as promised
customer_reviews.text: This has a nice consistency, not too oily or too dry. Helps with cold sores, which is why I paid extra for the L-Lysine ingredient.
customer_reviews.author: Peg Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Best lip ointment ever & good for skin irritations too
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. Would give more than 5-stars if I could. I was getting back-to-back cold sores with harsh winter. Haven’t had one since I started using. Also discovered it is a great skin cream. I had a rash that peeled on my face (yes I have very sensitive skin) and this was very soothing and cleared it right up. Bought bottles for hubby & son. It’s a little runny so a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: Poor delivery
customer_reviews.text: Read reviews that this helps dry lips but delivery person just left it in the 110 heat and in the sun so upon opening it was oozing down the side of jar at least he could have rang my bell
customer_reviews.author: Jam

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. Most everything, other than carmex makes my lips itch like crazy! This stuff doesn't cause any irritation, it's long-lasting, and helps my lips stay moisturized.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Hull

customer_reviews.title: Thanks.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I use this for my chapped lips. It Goes on real smoothe and Smell good too. It Makes my lips soft and kissable. Muah.
customer_reviews.author: M. Malv

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing product.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. It healed my chapped lips overnight. The texture is creamy and not sticky and it stays on well. Absorbs into the lip and skin by morning. Very gentle and soothing. I will buy more and have been recommending it to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: margot fisher

customer_reviews.title: This is THE ONLY thing that will work for cold ...
customer_reviews.text: This is THE ONLY thing that will work for cold sores. I take L-Lysine vitamins every day in winter and use this daily as a lip balm. After loads of outbreaks, I haven't had anything in 2 years. If I feel a tingle, I up my L-Lysine pills and slather this on heavier and it goes away.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wallach

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I love how it feels once it sinks into the lips after a while and really effective for me with preventing cold sores. Forgot to put it on one morning and felt the tingle during the day, especially since the weather and my stress was working against me. Wish I could have brought it with me, having a more portable packaging would be great
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Man this stuff has my cold sores controlled like nothing I've ever used before. Its excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Dena

customer_reviews.title: No more cold sores!
customer_reviews.text: I first purchased this over 6 months ago & have not had a cold sore since! I had started getting cold sores once a month and started looking for a lysine supplement. I found this at the same time and thought I’d give it a try. It feels just like Vaseline & I started using it every night before bed. I never cracked open the supplement so I’m pretty sure this is what’s keeping them away!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Woodward

customer_reviews.title: I'm a believer!
customer_reviews.text: I usually get 3-4 coldsores every summer when I'm out in the sun. Last year after a trip to Mexico I even had 3 at once. I purchased this ointment and applied every few days at night. I'm so happy to say I havent had any breakouts all summer and I've been out in the sun more then ever.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Mortman

customer_reviews.title: Great lip ointment, great value!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing it softly for lips. The size is perfect and the price is good for the amount of product. I will order more.
customer_reviews.author: Reynamary45

customer_reviews.title: Amazing moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to not like! Everything about this product is incredible. I have very dry lips and this gets the job done, and it has lasting results! If you’re looking for some healing along with it, I usually put in about 5 drops of 100% natural melaleuca oil extract by dōTERRA. Both of these products combined work wonders for dry lips(and other dry skin areas!)
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Roncelli

customer_reviews.title: For raw skin. PERIOD
customer_reviews.text: This is def categorized incorrectly, BUT, wonderful product. We use it for cold sores, raw “cold” nose spots when sick.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Softens my lips and does actually prevent cold sores if applied early enough. As soon as I felt the tingling I applied this product a few times and I escaped the torture of a cold sore. In addition it helps with chapped lips from the cold weather. I love this product and cannot recommend it enough.
customer_reviews.author: evaline

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Does what is said it will do. The taste isnt that nice but it does a great job protecting my lips.
customer_reviews.author: Brittbrat

customer_reviews.title: Miracle lip balm
customer_reviews.text: This product has been a lifesaver for me. I use it twice a day. In the morning and before I go to bed. Cold sores barley appear anymore and if they do it’s a small unnoticeable bump that’s gone in a day or two and I just apply extra lip balm. I will continue to buy this and if you suffer from cold sores.. buy this stuff you will not regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it if you have issues with dry, cracked and peeling lips!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing during the winter months...I don’t have any issues with cold sores but experience dry, flaky and peeling lips when the seasons change especially in the winter & literally within abt 3 days my lips were back to normal. This stuff is amazing & u totally get your money’s worth. I also use it as a night moisturizer before going to bed & my lips have never felt so soft. I ordered a second jar for my son because he does have cold sores so we’ll definitely see how it works for him.
customer_reviews.author: ATouchOfChanel

customer_reviews.title: Gross
customer_reviews.text: Gross and greasy. Did not soak into my lips just sat on the surface. Gross taste too.
customer_reviews.author: amandanicks

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I had been experiencing very dry chapped lips and had bought at least a dozen types of lip balms. This is the only product that worked and did not irritate my lips.
customer_reviews.author: Eighth Kid

customer_reviews.title: Really Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I get cold sores 1-2x a year that are painful and sometimes linger for over a month. I always use abbreva and assumed it was helping. I was wrong! I tried this instead and immediately noticed a difference after 48 hours. I will always use this from now on. I also tend to have sensitive skin and lips and this was non-irritating.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Go back to old potency
customer_reviews.text: Didnt work well ar all use to long ago but didnt like it this time
customer_reviews.author: Erneice moore

customer_reviews.title: Very thick
customer_reviews.text: Don’t use to much or it will clog your pores
customer_reviews.author: Meg

product_meta.title: Basic Organics L-Lysine Lip Ointment, 0.875 oz
feature_bullets: Formula includes vitamins A, D and E, Tincture of Benzoin, Menthol and Camphor
Effective in significantly reducing cold sore symptoms
Aids in relief of cold sores, fever blisters, dry chapped lips, dry skin and minor skin irritations
Easy-to-carry, convenient-size jar is a perfect fit for any purse or pocket
Light citrus scent, no added fragrance, made in small batches in the USA
